alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 7:19AM CDT until March 28 at 9:34AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central Missouri, including the following counties, Camden, Maries, Miller and Pulaski, Phelps and Dent. In southwest Missouri, Dallas, Laclede and Webster. * WHEN...Until 145 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 717 AM CDT, The Department of Transportation reported numerous road closures due to flooding. - This includes the following low water crossings... Dry Auglaize Creek at Freedom Ridge Road, Smoky Hollow at Highway J, Osage Fork at Auburn Road, Norman Creek at County Road 4220, Mountain Creek at Kinfolk Road, Wet Glaize at Carrol Cave Road and Maries River at County Road 211. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
